recipe.title: How to Make Ramen
recipe.intro: Ramen is a popular Japanese noodle soup. The warm broth is very comforting.
recipe.ingredients: ramen noodles, pork, egg, soy sauce, miso, garlic, green onion, nori, water, sesame oil
steps: **Boil** water in a big pot and cook the noodles for three minutes.
**Make** the broth with water, soy sauce, miso, and garlic in another pot.
**Cook** the pork in a pan with sesame oil until it is brown.
**Boil** an egg for seven minutes, then put it in cold water and peel it.
**Put** the noodles in a bowl and pour the hot broth over them.
**Add** the pork, egg, green onion, and nori on top. **Enjoy!**

review.content: I went to Harbour Light Noodle Bar in Kirribilli last week. It was near the harbour. I could see the Sydney Harbour Bridge from my seat. The view was amazing. I ordered miso ramen. The broth was hot and so good. The noodles were perfect. The restaurant was small and cozy. There were warm yellow lights inside. I felt very happy there.
